name: Dungeon Dweller (eldalland)
description:
Beware young knight, this castle is home to many horrible beasts. However, may you climb the highest tower and delve into the darkest dungeon, you will be rewarded.

Controls: W - jump

W+A  - jump left

W+D - jump right

A - move left

D - move right

Credit:

Sprites: Banners : Anokolisa,

Castle block sprites, torches, weapon rack, e.t.c: Open Pixel Project.

Knight: pzUH

Sign: jamiebrownhill

collectables and spikes: blackdragon1727

Music: Sounds from royalty free sites.
